name: 阿妮拉·西多尔斯卡
name_full: 阿妮拉·西多尔斯卡 Aniela Sidorska
introduction: Academy Award® nominated producer and writer of the 2024 Sundance Grand Jury Prize winner Porcelain War. The film went on to win the 2025 Directors Guild of America award and was nominated by the Producers Guild of America (PGA) and the American Society of Cinematographers (ASC) awards. Aniela is a member of the Producers Guild of America, the Academy of Television Arts & Sciences, and winner of the 2025 Alfred I. duPont-Columbia University Awards for excellence in broadcast journalism.
